backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a blog backend with CRUD operations for posts (create, read, update, delete), blob storage mixin for image handling, and in-memory Map storage for posts with auto-incrementing IDs.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two implemented features: a category dropdown ('Kategori') with five predefined Swedish categories and a secondary suggested title dropdown ('Föreslagen titel') that populates based on selected category.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing the React application structure with TanStack Router, Swedish localization, Internet Identity authentication, image upload/display functionality, and category/title suggestion features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color palette for light and dark modes, CSS custom properties for design tokens, and base styling for the editorial blog theme.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with Swedish language attribute (lang='sv'), HKLO title, and root div mounting point for the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining root route with Outlet, public login route, and three protected routes (home, post detail, create) each wrapped with ProtectedRoute and Layout components.
frontend/src/components/ImageGallery.tsx: Reusable component that converts Uint8Array images to blob URLs and displays them in a responsive grid layout (1-3 columns) with loading states and automatic cleanup.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout wrapper with sticky header containing HKLO branding and Swedish navigation (Hem, Skapa inlägg, Logga ut), logout functionality via Internet Identity hook, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Blog post card component displaying title, author, date, content preview, and optional thumbnail image (first image from post.images array) with Swedish 'Läs mer' link and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Authentication wrapper component that shows loading spinner during initialization, redirects unauthenticated users to /login, and renders children only for authenticated Internet Identity users.
frontend/src/data/titleSuggestions.ts: Defines blog post categories (Livsstil, Livsberättelser, Mat, Hobby, Djupa tankar) and provides Swedish title suggestions for each category.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageUpload.ts: React hook for managing image uploads with validation (type, 10MB limit), preview generation, progress tracking, and conversion to Uint8Array blobs.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching published posts, individual posts by ID, and creating new posts with optional images using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom warm editorial color palette for light and dark modes, plus typography enhancements for serif headings.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Form page for creating blog posts with title suggestions by category, content editor, author field, publish toggle, and multi-image upload with validation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page that displays all published blog posts sorted by creation date in a grid layout with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Login page component that uses Internet Identity for authentication, displays a welcome card with login button, and redirects authenticated users to home.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Post detail page that fetches and displays a single blog post with title, author, date, content, and optional image gallery, with navigation back to home.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormatter.ts: Utility function that converts Time type (nanoseconds) to Swedish-formatted date string (year, month, day).
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH, typography plugin, container queries, animations, and extended font families.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing implemented features including blog post display, creation form, Swedish translation, Internet Identity authentication, and editorial design.
